summary: New Game Saves for Perkus Maximus
descriptionHtml:
Saves i made for myself in case i wished to restart again and thought others might like them as well

A few saves with only the following used:-
All DLC's
All Unoffical Patches (Not HD Textures)
Perkus Maximus
SKSE
SkyUI

8 Saves in Total
Character Creation
Imperial or Stormcloak - Decide who to follow into the keep
Imperial Unbound Completed - as you leave the cave
Stormcloak Unbound Completed - as you leave the cave
Imperial Guardian Stones (no birth stone selected)
Stormcloak Guard Stones (no birth stone selected)
Imperial Riverwood (no birth stone selected)
Stormcloak Riverwood (no birth stone selected)

I used the default nord male called prisoner to change you character etc

you can use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/?]ShowRaceMenu Alternative[/url] by Seb263

you can change everything without breaking your game

DO NOT use the console commands as this can break your Character.
author: Viglen
